alert.note: Alert for South Central Utah; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 21 at 3:07AM MDT until March 23 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT THURSDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Zion National Park and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: South Central Utah; Zion National Park
